title: Um... How was I supposed to avoid this 20 min lower prio queue when it was due to your client not me
body:
I was in champ select, suddenly it closed and read the words "Group disbanded" , So i went to launch another game, when I try to join queue I get the words as shown in the image above, so I restart my client quickly. .... Nothing happens... im taken to the homepage and I try to join a new queue again. I get the same msg ... "game already in progress blah blah blah", now suddenly I have a 20 min queue timer? really???????

Sigh.

replies.body:
It sounds like your client had a pretty severe issue connecting to the server. At first, your issue sounded like a simple *ghost game* issue, but now I'm convinced that there were issues with your client communicating with the server as a whole that prevented you from reaching champ select. I recommend ensuring your local network settings are aligned with those listed on our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
